item.title: Mohit Suri’s ‘Saiyaara’ Bets Big on Bollywood Romance: ‘The Heart Still Aches in the Same Place’
item.description: While Bollywood doubled down on spectacle in the post-COVID era, director Mohit Suri made a radical choice: He wrote a love story no one wanted to make. Now, with “Saiyaara” starring newco
